DOC.brief_title: Observing Changes Ventilation Pattern During Procedural Sedation

This observational study aim record breath-by-breath respiratory rate , tidal volume end-tidal CO2 patient procedural sedation endoscopy procedure . Data analysis offline aim identify pattern ventilation may precede apnea blood oxygen desaturation . The pattern ventilation precede apnea blood oxygen saturation compare contrast pattern ventilation normal ventilation period .
